title: 2005년 United States v. Wilson Joseph 사건
summary: 미국 USA, Federal 법원 판결 사건. 사건명: United States v. Wilson Joseph. 판결일: 2005-11-28. 법원: Court of Appeals for the Eleventh Circuit.
description:
## 사건 정보

**사건명**: UNITED STATES of America, Plaintiff-Appellee, v. Wilson JOSEPH, A.K.A. Wilson Petit Frere-Joseph, Defendant-Appellant
**판결일**: 2005-11-28
**법원**: Court of Appeals for the Eleventh Circuit
**관할**: USA, Federal

**판사**: Per Curiam, Pryor, Tjoflat, Wilson

## 변호인

Anne R. Schultz, U.S. Attorney’s Office, Miami, FL, for Plaintiff-Appellee., J. Rafael Rodriguez, Rodriguez & Fernandez PA, Miami, FL, for Defendant-Appellant.

## 인용

- 156 F. App'x 180

## 판결문 요약

                                                         [DO NOT PUBLISH]


              IN THE UNITED STATES COURT OF APPEALS
                                                                  FILED
                       FOR THE ELEVENTH CIRCUIT   U.S. COURT OF APPEALS
                         ________________________   ELEVENTH CIRCUIT
                                                          NOVEMBER 28, 2005
                                 No. 04-15705              THOMAS K. KAHN
                            Non-Argument Calendar              CLERK
                           ________________________

                       D. C. Docket No. 03-60182-CR-KAM

UNITED STATES OF AMERICA,


                                                          Plaintiff-Appellee,

                                     versus

WILSON JOSEPH,
a.k.a. Wilson Petit Frere-Joseph,

                                                          Defendant-Appellant.


                           ________________________

                  Appeal from the United States District Court
                      for the Southern District of Florida
                         _________________________

                                (November 28, 2005)

Before TJOFLAT, WILSON and PRYOR, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM:
       Wilson Joseph appeals his conviction and sentence for conspiracy to possess

cocaine with intent to distribute and attempt to possess cocaine with intent to

distribute. See 21 U.S.C. §§ 841, 846. ...
